医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究表明枫糖浆尿液疾病的成功基因治疗UMass Chan研究人员领导的一项研究表明，一种基因疗法纠正导致枫糖浆尿液疾病（MSUD）的突变，可以防止新生儿死亡，归一化的生长，恢复受影响基因的协调表达并稳定小牛和小鼠的生物标记物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-dymstrates-successful-gene-therapy-for-maple-maple-syrup-urine-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-dymstrates-successful-gene-therapy-for-maple-maple-syrup-urine-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0693fe05-9c14-4cbe-b3c1-fa8a36186fd6 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 13:12:00 -0500 Study demonstrates successful gene therapy for maple syrup urine disease
研究确定了在学校维持快照计划的障碍新的研究揭示了通过补充营养援助计划教育（SNAP-ED）资助的伙伴关系来维持政策，系统和环境（PSE）变化的重大障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-Identifies-barriers-barriers-barriers-to-snap-snap-ed-eD-programsin-in-schools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-indistifies-barriers-barriers-barriers-sustaping-snap-ed-ed-programs-in-schools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0795b64d-a8ae-409D-9197-508DB34F70F9 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 13:05:00 -0500 Study identifies barriers to sustaining SNAP-Ed programs in schools
新的化学反应使肽和蛋白质的精确功能化新加坡国立大学（NUS）的药物科学家开发了一种新型的化学反应，使肽和蛋白质的精确官能化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/new-chemical-reaction-enction-enction-enables-precise-precise-precise-forcriational-of-of-peptides and-preteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/new-chemical-reaction-enection-enection-enables-precise-precise-precise-fortionalization-of-peptides and-peptides and-preteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=992E4060-A31E-49F7-B9FF-C22383212806 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 12:56:00 -0500 New chemical reaction enables precise functionalization of peptides and proteins

欧洲项目旨在开发新的稀有眼病治疗方法神经科学研究所的眼神经生物学实验室，该研究所是Elche的MiguelHernández大学（UMH）和西班牙国家研究委员会（CSIC），正在参加欧洲项目Restore Vision，这是一项雄心勃勃的计划，旨在开发诸如Aniridia and Neurotroploptroploptropthy and Neweasease的新疗法，旨在开发新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/european-project-aims-to-develop-new-wareatments-for--for-rare-reyee-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/european-project-aims-to-develop-new-wareatments-for-for-rare-reyee-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=C261C15-565B-4960-AA32-52F3B4BFACE5 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 12:39:00 -0500 European project aims to develop new treatments for rare eye diseases

评论阐明了长非编码RNA在肝病中的机械作用代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪分裂性肝病（MASLD），以前称为非酒精性脂肪肝病（NAFLD），是全球健康挑战，影响了全球近30％的成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/review-sheds-light-on-the-mechanisty-the-mechanistic--non-non-non-coding-rnas-rnas-rnas in-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/review-sheds-light-on-the-mechanisty-the-mechanistic-long-non-non-coding-rnas-rnas-rnas in-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4fc87b1-99cd-4607-9920-50509d827cde Fri, 28 Feb 2025 12:24:00 -0500 Review sheds light on the mechanistic role of long non-coding RNAs in liver disease
探索肝胆道腺纤维瘤的分子特征肝胆道腺纤维瘤（BAF）是一种罕见的良性胆管肿瘤，由于其潜在的作用是肝内胆管癌（ICCA）的潜在作用，因此引起了人们的注意。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/exploring-the-molecular-characteristical-of-hepatic-biliary-adenenofibroma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/exploring-the-molecular-characteristical-of-hepatic-biliary-adenenofibroma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8EE8B29C-72A9-40FD-A4D3-F79837F1109D Fri, 28 Feb 2025 12:17:00 -0500 Exploring the molecular characteristics of hepatic biliary adenofibroma

研究人员发现影响儿童发育的关键血分子麦克马斯特大学的研究人员已经确定了血液中可能影响幼儿发展的小分子，表明饮食暴露，早期生活经历和肠道健康如何影响孩子的成长和认知里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/researchers-discover-key-blood-molecules-molecules-impacting-child-child-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/researchers-discover-key-blood-molecules-molecules-impacting-child-child-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da108aA8AA8AA.3A-49DE-AD44-3BC4BC4BD2D3F97 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 12:03:00 -0500 Researchers discover key blood molecules impacting child development
